required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study Assessing Efficacy and Safety of NFL-101 as a Tobacco Cessation Therapy
clinical_study.official_title: Study Assessing Efficacy and Safety of NFL-101 as a Tobacco Cessation Therapy

brief_summary.textblock:
CESTO 2 is a 318 participants, 3-arm, multicentric, randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled Phase II clinical trial.
The main objectives are to select the most efficient dose and to assess long-term efficacy of NFL-101 compared to placebo, for abrupt cessation and for reduction before cessation.

detailed_description.textblock: Long-term smoking cessation or reduction had been observed in thousands of patients when 1 or 2 subcutaneous injections of a desensitization treatment against tobacco allergy were taking place concomitantly with Target Quit Date (TQD). NFL Biosciences SAS developed a tobacco cessation drug candidate (NFL-101) consisting of a nicotine-free extract of tobacco proteins. According to the observations made during CESTO, a Phase I study on 24 smokers, NFL-101 appears to work by reducing cigarette appetence immediately and over a week after each injection.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: Rate of participants achieving 4-week continuous abstinence
primary_outcome.description: 4-weekcontinuous abstinence measured from D15 to D43

primary_outcome.measure: Rate of participants achieving 6-month continuous abstinence
primary_outcome.description: 6-month continuous abstinence measured from D15 to M6

secondary_outcome.measure: Rate of participants achieving 12-month continuous abstinence
secondary_outcome.description: 12-month continuous abstinence measured from D15 to M12

secondary_outcome.measure: Rate of participants achieving 3-month continuous abstinence
secondary_outcome.description: 3-month continuous abstinence measured from D15 to M3

secondary_outcome.measure: Rate of participants achieving 3-month continuous abstinence End of Treatment
secondary_outcome.description: continuous abstinence measured during 3-month after end of treatment

secondary_outcome.measure: Rate of participants achieving 6-month continuous abstinence End of Treatment
secondary_outcome.description: continuous abstinence measured during 6-month after end of treatment

secondary_outcome.measure: Rate of participants achieving 3-month continuous abstinence End of Study
secondary_outcome.description: continuous abstinence measured from M9 to M12

arm_group.description: 50 µg per injection (in each arm), two injections at day 1, two injections at day 8, optional injections later on
100 µg per injection (in each arm), two injections at day 1, two injections at day 8, optional injections later on
The placebo will consist of two syringes containing 1 mL of dilution solution, two injections at day 1, two injections at day 8, optional injections later on

facility.name: College of Health and Medicine, University of Tasmania
